Summarize hierarchy counts

Source: R/tidyMS_R6_AnalysisConfiguration.R
summarize_hierarchy.Rd

Summarize hierarchy counts

summarize_hierarchy(
  pdata,
  config,
  hierarchy = config$table$hkeysDepth(),
  factors = character()
)

Arguments

pdata

data.frame
config

AnalysisConfiguration
hierarchy

for which hierarchy level (default up to hierarchy depth)
factors

which factors to include

See also

Other summary: INTERNAL_FUNCTIONS_BY_FAMILY, hierarchy_counts_sample(), hierarchy_counts(), nr_B_in_A_per_sample()

Examples


library(prolfqua)
library(tidyverse)

bb <- prolfqua::ionstar$filtered()

#> Column added : nr_peptide_Id_IN_protein_Id
stopifnot(nrow(bb$data) == 25780)
configur <- bb$config$clone(deep=TRUE)
data <- bb$data

summarize_hierarchy(data, configur)

#> # A tibble: 163 x 3
#>    protein_Id                       isotope_n peptide_Id_n
#>    <chr>                                <int>        <int>
#>  1 CON__P01030~9~NA                         1            3
#>  2 CON__P02769~18~NA                        1           34
#>  3 CON__P34955~32~NA                        1           13
#>  4 CON__Q28107~41~NA                        1            4
#>  5 CON__Q3SZR3~50~NA                        1            7
#>  6 sp|L0R819|ASURF_HUMAN~152~L0R819         1            2
#>  7 sp|O00148|DX39A_HUMAN~156~O00148         1           11
#>  8 sp|O14548|COX7R_HUMAN~221~O14548         1            2
#>  9 sp|O14745|NHRF1_HUMAN~240~O14745         1           11
#> 10 sp|O15145|ARPC3_HUMAN~283~O15145         1            3
#> # ... with 153 more rows
summarize_hierarchy(data, configur, factors = character())

#> # A tibble: 163 x 3
#>    protein_Id                       isotope_n peptide_Id_n
#>    <chr>                                <int>        <int>
#>  1 CON__P01030~9~NA                         1            3
#>  2 CON__P02769~18~NA                        1           34
#>  3 CON__P34955~32~NA                        1           13
#>  4 CON__Q28107~41~NA                        1            4
#>  5 CON__Q3SZR3~50~NA                        1            7
#>  6 sp|L0R819|ASURF_HUMAN~152~L0R819         1            2
#>  7 sp|O00148|DX39A_HUMAN~156~O00148         1           11
#>  8 sp|O14548|COX7R_HUMAN~221~O14548         1            2
#>  9 sp|O14745|NHRF1_HUMAN~240~O14745         1           11
#> 10 sp|O15145|ARPC3_HUMAN~283~O15145         1            3
#> # ... with 153 more rows

summarize_hierarchy(data, configur,
 hierarchy = configur$table$hkeysDepth() )

#> # A tibble: 163 x 3
#>    protein_Id                       isotope_n peptide_Id_n
#>    <chr>                                <int>        <int>
#>  1 CON__P01030~9~NA                         1            3
#>  2 CON__P02769~18~NA                        1           34
#>  3 CON__P34955~32~NA                        1           13
#>  4 CON__Q28107~41~NA                        1            4
#>  5 CON__Q3SZR3~50~NA                        1            7
#>  6 sp|L0R819|ASURF_HUMAN~152~L0R819         1            2
#>  7 sp|O00148|DX39A_HUMAN~156~O00148         1           11
#>  8 sp|O14548|COX7R_HUMAN~221~O14548         1            2
#>  9 sp|O14745|NHRF1_HUMAN~240~O14745         1           11
#> 10 sp|O15145|ARPC3_HUMAN~283~O15145         1            3
#> # ... with 153 more rows
summarize_hierarchy(data, configur,
 hierarchy = NULL, factors = configur$table$fkeysDepth() )

#> # A tibble: 5 x 4
#>   dilution. isotope_n protein_Id_n peptide_Id_n
#>   <chr>         <int>        <int>        <int>
#> 1 a                 1          163         1258
#> 2 b                 1          163         1258
#> 3 c                 1          163         1258
#> 4 d                 1          163         1258
#> 5 e                 1          163         1258
configur$table$hierarchyDepth = 1
summarize_hierarchy(data, configur,
 factors = configur$table$fkeysDepth())

#> # A tibble: 815 x 4
#> # Groups:   dilution. [5]
#>    dilution. protein_Id                       isotope_n peptide_Id_n
#>    <chr>     <chr>                                <int>        <int>
#>  1 a         CON__P01030~9~NA                         1            3
#>  2 a         CON__P02769~18~NA                        1           34
#>  3 a         CON__P34955~32~NA                        1           13
#>  4 a         CON__Q28107~41~NA                        1            4
#>  5 a         CON__Q3SZR3~50~NA                        1            7
#>  6 a         sp|L0R819|ASURF_HUMAN~152~L0R819         1            2
#>  7 a         sp|O00148|DX39A_HUMAN~156~O00148         1           11
#>  8 a         sp|O14548|COX7R_HUMAN~221~O14548         1            2
#>  9 a         sp|O14745|NHRF1_HUMAN~240~O14745         1           11
#> 10 a         sp|O15145|ARPC3_HUMAN~283~O15145         1            3

configur$table$hierarchyDepth = 2
summarize_hierarchy(data, configur)
